statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id > 100;
SELECT name, location FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT bio FROM user_profiles WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE location = 'New York' AND bio LIKE '%engineer%';
SELECT user_id, email, preferences FROM user_profiles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT name, email, location, bio FROM user_profiles WHERE preferences ->> 'theme' = 'dark' OR preferences ->> 'font_size' = '14';
SELECT user_id, name, email, location FROM user_profiles WHERE bio ILIKE '%manager%' ORDER BY name ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfile;
SELECT user_id, full_name FROM UserProfile WHERE age > 25;
SELECT * FROM UserProfile ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM UserProfile WHERE gender = 'female';
SELECT full_name, age, email FROM UserProfile WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM UserProfile WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT email, full_name FROM UserProfile WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY user_id ASC, age DESC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, gender, age FROM UserProfile WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC, full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE preference_category = 'Music' AND preference_value = 'Rock' ORDER BY preference_id ASC;

SELECT user_id, full_name, email, gender FROM UserProfile UP JOIN UserPreferences UPref ON UP.user_id = UPref.user_id WHERE UPref.preference_category = 'Food' ORDER BY UP.full_name ASC, UPref.preference_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT full_name, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM users ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE full_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;

SELECT u.username, p.category, r.recommendation_text FROM users u INNER JOIN preferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id INNER JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE p.preference_value = 'high' ORDER BY r.relevance_score DESC;

SELECT u.full_name, p.category, r.recommendation_text FROM users u LEFT JOIN preferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id LEFT JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE u.created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT u.username, COUNT(r.recommendation_id) AS num_recommendations FROM users u LEFT JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING num_recommendations >= 5 ORDER BY num_recommendations DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM Recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT username, full_name FROM UserProfiles WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT article_title FROM KnowledgeBase WHERE article_content LIKE '%tutorial%';
SELECT username, full_name, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM Recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT article_title FROM KnowledgeBase WHERE article_content LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT user_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM UserPreferences WHERE preference_name IN ('theme', 'language') ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT rec_id, user_id, recommendation, date_created FROM Recommendations ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT user_id, city FROM Users WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT kb_id, title, category FROM KnowledgeBase WHERE category = 'Programming' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT user_id, city FROM Users WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT kb_id, title, content, category FROM KnowledgeBase WHERE category='Technology' AND title LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT rec_id, recommendation, date_created FROM Recommendations WHERE user_id=(SELECT user_id FROM Users WHERE username='John_Doe');
